text: Atlantic City is a 1980 Canadian French romantic crime drama movie. It was directed by Louis Malle. Actors include: Susan Sarandon, Burt Lancaster, Al Waxman, Kate Reid, Hollis McLaren, and Robert Goulet. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. Atlantic City was nominated for 5 Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1982. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 crime drama movies Category:1980 romantic drama movies Category:Canadian crime movies Category:Canadian romance movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Louis Malle Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: Atlantic City (movie)
